channel.title: Help with server
channel.description:
I'm new with working with Runescape Private Servers. I Recently download MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan. I opened the file in Program files and I am trying to edit things in the game, like add objects like portals and chests, but I cannot find the Client.Java file in the folder. Can someone please help me. I'm not much of a Techinal person but I do know the basics.
Thank you, Guitars595 :)

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Guitars,

LOL,

cheers - Jube Head.

Nah Joking. When it says ‘recompile with xlint’ it means… I WORKED. lol sheesh…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Well that helps. I been trying to figure out how to setup a server but I can’t get it right. I followed a guide and when I got to the step where you have to compile and it always screws up at that moment. I opened the compiler in Notepad, changed it to what it is supposed to be but it does not work! I have tried numerous guides to try to make one but none of them work! Please help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 09:53:06 AM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me make a server please! I need a tutorial or something. Its so confusing![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 10:06:11 AM[/size][hr]I really need help!!! I don’t understand this. I downloaded Cheezescape. I opened it up, followed the instructions, edited Compile, compiled it and it said I need to Recompile with Xlint. I searched Google and didn’t help me at all! Please help…

Read full topic
